# Remove \u0307 following soft-dotteds (i, j, and the like), with possible intervening non-230 marks.
::NFD();
[:Soft_Dotted:] [^[:ccc=Not_Reordered:][:ccc=Above:]]* { \u0307 → ;
::Any-Upper();
::NFC();
